settings.heading: Miracle of the Sea
settings.description: Sea moss is a nutrient-rich seaweed that may offer several potential health benefits. It's a natural source of essential minerals and vitamins like calcium, magnesium, potassium, and iodine, which can support bone health, digestion, and thyroid function. Sea moss also contains fiber that promotes gut health and may have anti-inflammatory properties. However, more research is needed to fully understand its effects on human health, and it may not be suitable for everyone.

settings.heading: This Superfood Contains:
settings.description:
• Calcium: important for bones, teeth, muscles, nerves and blood.
  • Magnesium: involved in regulating the nervous system, heart rhythm, strengthens bones and muscles.
  • Potassium: supports normal heart function, participates in fluid regulation in the body.
  • Iodine: necessary for normal thyroid function, participates in regulating metabolism.
  • Iron: necessary for blood formation and maintaining immune system health.
  • Folic acid: necessary for nervous system health, immunity and cell growth.

These nutrients play an important role in maintaining overall health, and sea moss is one of the sources to obtain them.

settings.heading: Hand made from real wildcrafted sea moss
settings.description: We take pride in our commitment to using only the finest ingredients in our sea moss gel. That's why we exclusively use 100% authentic wildcrafted sea moss, carefully sourced from the pristine waters of St. Lucia in the Caribbean. This small island is renowned for producing the highest quality sea moss available, ensuring that our customers receive the full benefits and nutrients of this powerful superfood. With our sea moss gel, you can rest assured that you're getting the best possible product for your health and well-being.

settings.heading: Instructions:
settings.description:
To ensure the freshness and quality of our sea moss gel, we recommend storing it in the refrigerator as soon as you receive it. This will help maintain the natural nutrients and benefits of the sea moss.

Our sea moss gel can be safely stored in the refrigerator for up to 3-4 weeks. However, we recommend consuming it regularly for best results. The recommended daily amount is 1-2 tablespoons.

You can enjoy our sea moss gel by itself or mix it with your favorite beverages and foods. It's a versatile ingredient that blends well with smoothies, teas, juices, and even coffee. Experiment with different recipes and find your favorite way to incorporate sea moss into your daily routine.

settings.title: What is Sea Moss?
settings.text: Sea Moss is a type of seaweed/algae believed to boost your immune health by helping prevent and relieve cold and flu-like symptoms. It is found on the Atlantic coastlines of North America/Europe, and the Carribean Islands. Irish Sea Μοss has been used for generations in places like Ireland, Scotland, and Jamaica in food and healing remedies. Sea Moss is most commonly known for its anti-inflammatory, anti-aging, anti-bacterial, and anti-viral properties.

• Contains 92 of the 102 essential minerals that are body are composed of

  • Contains a compound called Citrulline-Arginine, which facilitates cell growth.
  • Rich in collagen for healthier skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Are there any downsides to Sea Moss?
settings.text: Yes, overconsumption. Autoimmune thyroid conditions can come into play, such as Hashimoto's, which is a disease in which the immune system mistakenly attacks the thyroid gland. Hypothyroidism is one of the most common problems.
